shapecode_2_border_a=0.060
shape_2_per_frame1=//// log tower
shape_2_per_frame2=
shape_2_per_frame3=i=instance;                           sample=i/num_inst;
shape_2_per_frame4=c1=bnot(instance%20);                 c2=bnot(instance%40);
shape_2_per_frame5=p=int(20*sample);                     t=3*time;
shape_2_per_frame6=rad1=rad*(1+.5*sin(.05*t));
shape_2_per_frame7=rad=rad1*log(.05*p)*sin(.05*p+.1*t);                  rad=rad*(1-.93*c1);
shape_2_per_frame8=
shape_2_per_frame9=///// losang
shape_2_per_frame10=x1=sin(i+t);                          y1=cos(i+t);
shape_2_per_frame11=x1=x1-.9*atan(x1*y1)*sign(y1);
shape_2_per_frame12=mx=x1*sin(.1*t)+y1*cos(.1*t);         my=y1*sin(.1*t)-x1*cos(.1*t);
shape_2_per_frame13=
shape_2_per_frame14=x=.0*sample*sin(-.15*t);              y=.5*sin(5*sample-.1*t)*rad1*sample;
shape_2_per_frame15=x= x+8.*c1*rad*mx;                    y= y+8.*c1*rad*my;
shape_2_per_frame16=x=.5+ x/q6;                           y=.5+ y/q5;
shape_2_per_frame17=
shape_2_per_frame18=r=if(c1,1,1);                         r2=if(c1,.1,-.1+2*sample);
shape_2_per_frame19=g=if(c2,.3,1);                        g2=r2;
shape_2_per_frame20=b=g;                                  b2=g2;
shape_2_per_frame21=a=1-bnot(i-10)-bnot(i-20);            a2=a;
shape_2_per_frame22=border_a=.2*a;                        ang=3.14/4-.1*t; 
shape_2_per_frame23=sides=4+30*c1;
shape_2_per_frame24=
shapecode_3_enabled=0
shapecode_3_sides=50
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=100
shapecode_3_x=0.490
shapecode_3_y=0.280
shapecode_3_rad=0.29173
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=0.80193
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=1.000
shapecode_3_b=1.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=1.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=1.000
shapecode_3_a2=1.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.000
per_frame_1=decay=.1;
per_frame_2=wave_a=0;
per_frame_3=zoom=1;
per_frame_4=warp=0;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=q5=aspectx;
per_frame_7=q6=aspecty;
per_frame_8=
per_frame_9=bt=bt+bass_att/fps;
per_frame_10=q1=bt;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`    
warp_6=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_7=`    ret *= 1.00; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_8=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_4=`ret-=roam_sin*roam_cos.zxy;
comp_5=`ret-=roam_sin.wzy*roam_cos;
comp_6=`float4 noise2 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
comp_7=`                      ((uv.xyy
comp_8=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
comp_9=`                      ).xyz*
comp_10=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
comp_11=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*0.4 
comp_12=`                     );
comp_13=`ret -= (noise2)*.5; 
comp_14=`    ret *= 1.00; //gamma
comp_15=`}
